name: Foot Controller demo for Google VR
name_original: Foot Controller demo for Google VR
description:
This is an android based VR demo which can be played with a custom foot controller. An attempt to solve the problem of 'walking around' in VR games.

Please see the demonstration of the project here.

https://youtu.be/3RxmK3wPuks

This project is built for the purpose of altCtrlGameJam. Though you can play, the movement of the character requires the custom controller described in the video.
